name: Espanha & Associados - Sociedade de Advogados, SP, RL
goal: Law firm focused on tax, corporate and labour law. Strong presence on the finance sector, namely insurance.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
